Name: Average time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Total time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Average time between 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and 'Assign a Different Editor'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in the review process
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time to 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Average waiting time to 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' after 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time it takes 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to be followed by 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time for 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to lead to a manuscript's acceptance or rejection decision
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and the end of case where activity 'SW-EIC Accept occurs

Name: Minimum resolution time of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in leading to 'SW-EIC Major Revision'
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'SW-EIC Accept' in cases leading to acceptance
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Average time for 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' before 'Unassign Editor' occurs
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'Unassign Editor'

Name: Total time for 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' in variants leading to 'RW-EIC Minor Revision'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'RW-EIC Minor Revision'

Name: Minimum time from 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' to 'First Look-Please submit updates' in successful revision cycles
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' and activity 'First Look-Please submit updates'
